name: nihilist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who believes that all political and religious organizations are bad, or that there are no principles or beliefs that have any meaning or can be true: The overwhelming majority of atheists are not nihilists. The character she is playing is a moral nihilist. See
nihilism
More examplesFewer examplesHe was not a nihilist, and his films were not only about emptiness but about the desire for fullness.There is little prospect of political negotiation with suicidal nihilists who simply want to destroy.Some labeled him a nihilist for his subversion of traditional principles.
